message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll take 90% and you get 10%, but we can negotiate further if you'd like.
I'd like a higher share, but I'm willing to compromise. Your turn to negotiate!
I understand you want a bigger share, but 7000 for me and 3000 for you seems like a reasonable compromise. Let's end this now and avoid further inflation.
I'm still not satisfied with the split. I'll take 55% this time, but you'll have to do better than that next round!
We're both losing money with each round.  Let's meet in the middle this time. 6000 for me, 4000 for you - that's a fair split.
I'm not convinced the middle ground is the best option. I'll take 65% this time, and see if you can do better next round!
We're running out of time and losing money. Let's split it evenly this time and avoid further losses. 5000 for me, 5000 for you.  We can both benefit from a fair split.
I'm not willing to settle for an even split. I'll take 70% this time, and I expect you to do better than a 30% share next round!

I'm getting desperate now, and I don't want to risk getting nothing.  I'll take 40%, and you can have 60% of the remaining money.  It's a huge concession, but let's end this before we both get nothing!
I'm not impressed by your concession. I'll take 75% this time, and I expect you to be more generous next round!
We're down to the wire. I'm willing to take a huge hit to secure something. I'll accept 30% and you can have 70%. This is my final offer.
I'm taking everything. I've had enough of your games. I'll take 85% and you'll get the remaining 15%. It's my final offer, and I expect you to accept it.
